item.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard - All Status Effects (& What They Do)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Negative Status Effects in Dragon Age: The Veilguard
  • All Positive Status Effects in Dragon Age: The Veilguard

While the way players fight in Dragon Age: The Veilguard has changed drastically, the overarching flow of combat has remained more or less the same. Buffs and debuffs still play a big part in battles, and you'll want to know what each effect does if you want to make the most out of your builds.

Making proper use of status effects is going to be crucial if you're playing the hardest difficulties in Dragon Age: The Veilguard . There are a lot of these effects, though, and if you want to know what they do, here's a little cheat sheet to help you out.

All Negative Status Effects in Dragon Age: The Veilguard

Negative status effects (referred to as Afflictions in-game) work the same way as debuffs in other RPG games . They'll either deal damage-over-time to an afflicted target, or hamper them in some way, like increasing the damage they take or slowing down their movement. These effects can also affect you and your party, and you may need to change your abilities if you want to use these effects to your advantage..

Name

Effect

Arcane Mark

Turns into Arcane Bomb when enough damage has been dealt. Arcane Bomb is detonated by Heavy Attacks.

Bees!

Deals Physical damage over time to affected targets.

Bleeding

Deals Physical damage over time. Does more damage to red health (not protected by armor or barriers).

Blighted

Obtained by stepping on Darkspawn Blight pools. Blighted decreases the damage and resistances of allies. If enemies are Blighted, they deal more damage and have increased resistances.

Burning

Deals Fire damage over time. Does more damage to armor.

Chilled

Deals Cold damage over time. Slows affected target's movement and attack speed.

Frozen

Renders targets unable to move or attack.

Knocked Back

Physically pushes targets back.

Knocked Down

Affected targets are forced into a prone state, rendering them immobile and harmless.

Necrosis

Deals Necrotic damage over time. Does more damage against barriers.

Overwhelmed

Affected targets take additional Stagger damage.

Quietus

Deals Necrotic damage over time. Unique to Emmerich.

Shocked

Targets receive damage and Stagger damage over time.

Staggered

Targets cannot attack or move, and they are vulnerable to Takedowns.

Sundered

Affected units take more damage from all sources.

Vulnerable

Targets have reduced damage resistances.

Weakened

Reduces the damage dealt by affected units.

All Positive Status Effects in Dragon Age: The Veilguard

Positive status effects are referred to as Advantages in Dragon Age: The Veilguard . These are buffs that provide useful effects to you and your party. They're great if you really want to min-max your damage, and if you're facing a particularly difficult enemy on the game's hardest difficulty, these will be necessary to give you the edge you need to win.

Name

Effect

Deflect

Negates the damage of one incoming attack.

Enhanced Damage

Target deals more damage.

Immovable

Provides immunity to effects like Knocked Back or Knocked Down.

Invulnerable

Grants total damage immunity.

Penetration

Ignores a percentage of a target's defenses.

Precision

The target's next Charged or Final Attack is a guaranteed critical hit.

Quickened

Reduces cooldowns.

Rallied

Increases damage dealt by affected targets.

Rejuvenation

Gradually heals targets over time.

Resistant

Increases the target's resistances to damage.

Revival Charge

If your health is depleted, you can return to life, consuming one Revival Charge.

Taunt

Taunted enemies are forced to attack whoever used Taunt on them.

item.title: One Piece Bounty Rush: Best Medals
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Equipping the right medals is crucial for character progression and boosting important stats in One Piece Bounty Rush.
  • Certain medals, like the Raid Kid Medal, Hancock Medal, and The Man Who Shook The World Medal, offer unique benefits and synergies.
  • Medals like the Ikoku Sovereignty Medal and Blast Breath Medal provide significant boosts to capture speed and damage in the game.

Boosting character stats is an essential part of creating the best treasure hunter in One Piece Bounty Rush . The best way to do this is to equip medals that correspond to that character's progression plan. The game includes hundreds of medals that can buff damage, health, critical chance, etc. But it's crucial to find the best ones that will really make an impact in all matches.

Players can equip up to three different medals on a single character, thus enabling trait synergies that play a huge part in a character's progression. These particular medals can benefit almost every single character in One Piece Bounty Rush , granting some of the top buffs and stat boosts.

8 Raid Kid Medal

Best Medal For HP Recovery

  • Main Tag: Worst Generation
  • Extra Traits: Critical, Attack, Defense

Restoring HP is an essential trait for any character who needs to endure longer battles. This medal can recover a character's HP by 3% every time they get hit with a knockback, which happens often. On top of that, it synergizes with the Land of Wano tags, which also boosts the cooldown reduction speed by 20%.

Players can put this medal together with the Kid and Law Medal and Three Captains Kid Medal for the ultimate boost of critical hit, attack power, and defense when equipping a set of three.

7 Hancock Medal

Best Medal For Cooldown Reduction

  • Main Tag: Gorgon Sisters
  • Extra Traits: Attack, HP

Reducing cooldown times of character skills is always a good idea. This medal grants a 13% cooldown reduction every time a friendly team secures more treasure in the match. Additionally, it reduces the Entrance status effect by 6%, which helps secure even more treasure, making the traits of this medal synergistic.

If there's a chance to combine this medal with the Perfume Femur Medal and Hancock Stampede Medal, then this set will also boost damage by 10% if an enemy enters a friendly treasure area.

6 The Man Who Shook The World Medal

Best Medal For Tremor Reduction

  • Main Tag: Captain
  • Extra Traits: Cooldown

Every One Piece Bounty Rush player knows the debilitating state of the Tremor status effect, when a character can't attack or even move. This medal can prevent such an effect taking place during treasure hunts, making it a lot easier to capture and defend treasure.

If it's possible to combine this medal with the Whitebeard Medal and the Strongest Man in the World Medal, then the capture speed is increased by 20%, and the defense is increased by another 13.5%.

5 Egghead Luffy Medal

Best Medal For Damage Reduction

  • Main Tag: Blood Brothers
  • Extra Traits: Attack, HP

On its own, the Egghead Luffy Medal is a perfect choice for reducing all incoming damage by 5% or more with the unlocked traits. It's an essential medal that needs to be in every character's arsenal, as damage reduction eliminates quick death, as well as knockouts and other nuisances of a similar character.

This medal can also be combined with the Luffy Post-Onigashima Medal and Luffy Future Outfit Medal for increased damage near the treasure.

4 Ikoku Sovereignty Medal

Best Medal For Boosting Capture Speed

  • Main Tag: Charlotte Family
  • Extra Traits: Attack, HP

Surviving and defeating enemies isn't really the main goal of the treasure hunt in One Piece Bounty Rush ; it's all about capturing treasure. The faster a team captures treasure, the more rewards it gets, and that's why the Ikoku Sovereignty Medal is so important, as it boosts the capture speed by 8%.

The other two medals of a similar type are the Big Mom Medal and the Olin Medal. When all three are equipped, it adds a significant boost to the character's damage around treasure.

3 Kaido Medal

Best Medal For Boosting Attack and Defense

  • Main Tag: Former Rocks Pirates
  • Extra Traits: Cooldown Reduction

The best part about this medal is that it fits various types of characters, granting them different traits. It goes on Straw Hat Pirates, defenders, green element characters, and others. It boosts their attack and defense, as well as reduces their cooldown times. It's a universally powerful tool that will fit many sets.

This powerful medal synergizes with the Conqueror of Three Worlds Ragnaraku Medal and the Blast Breath Medal, which reduce all incoming damage near the treasure.

2 Saw Medal

Best Medal For Critical Damage

  • Main Tag: Trio Captain
  • Extra Traits: Attack, Defense

Boosting damage alone isn't enough to win over big defenders, as that's where critical damage plays a pivotal role. The Saw Medal grants a whopping 120% boost to the character's critical damage, which is the highest buff of this type in the game. This massive boost triggers right after a knockout of the enemy.

It's possible to combine this medal with any of the Luffy or Zoro medals that a character may need. As a result, this will boost the capture speed of treasure by 20%.

1 Blast Breath Medal

Most Overpowered Medal For Damage

  • Main Tag: The Four Emperors
  • Extra Traits: Attack, HP

In the end, damage and attack power define whether the team wins or loses the match. That's why the Blast Breath Medal is considered the top choice for boosting the character's damage. It's automatically increased by 5% near the treasure, making it easier for allies to capture and defend it.

This medal goes well with other Kaido types, such as Human Monster Form. Once combined in a set, they'll provide an even larger damage boost to the equipped character.

item.title: Destiny is Giving Every Player These Incredible God Roll Weapons
item.description:
There was a brief period of paranoia within the Destiny 2 community about the odds of weapons dropping with desired perks, and after a short investigation, Bungie confirmed that ther was indeed a problem that made it harder to get certain rolls. To compensate, Banshee will be selling a number of weapons with excellent perk combos, and everyone will be able to buy them.

Most of these weapons are fairly old, but they're all still quite strong even when compared to all the new weapons in Destiny 2's Episode: Revenant . Players will be able to get these guns on Nov. 19, and while there's a planned deadline for these weapons, Bungie doesn't have a concrete date set yet. Here are all the weapons you can expect to find at Gunsmith by that time.

Multimach CCX

  • Polygonal Rifling + Tactical Mag + Attrition Orbs + Kinetic Tremors + Reload Masterwork

The Multimach isn't exactly known for being a PvE weapon, but an Attrition Orbs + Kinetic Tremors roll is actually pretty good against AI combatants. Imagine having a 900 RPM SMG that can fuel abilities, trigger Orb of Power effects, and deal AoE damage. Sure, guns like the Immortal and the Ikelos SMG have better class synergies, but a Multimach with this perk combo is great for a lot of builds too.

Attrition Orbs can help restore ability energy and trigger effects that require Orbs of Power. Meanwhile, Kinetic Tremors can deal extra damage to targets, and it can trigger Attrition Orbs as well. Just bear in mind that Attrition Orbs has an internal cooldown, so don't expect to swim in Orbs just because Kinetic Tremors is going off.

Rose

  • Fluted Barrel + Accurized Rounds + Slideshot + Explosive Payload + Smooth Grip + Handling Masterwork

Players who have been struggling to get a Rose in Destiny 2 will want to grab this one. Slideshot and Explosive Payload are top-tier PvP perks, and they aren't bad in PvE either. This is an incredibly well-rounded roll, and while it could use a different Barrel and Masterwork, it's a very good gun for Handcannon fans.

Slideshot partially refills a weapon's magazine and grants its next shot bonus Range and Stability after sliding. The latter two bonuses are especially useful in the Crucible, where the winner of a duel is often determined by whoever hits the first shot. Meanwhile, Explosive Payload negates damage fall-off for a part of a weapon's per-shot damage, and it makes enemy Guardians flinch harder than usual. It also makes weapons deal bonus damage versus combatants in PvE.

Indebted Kindness

  • Smart Drift Control + Tactical Mag + Loose Change + Voltshot + Velocity Masterwork

Voltshot alone is enough to make turn any Indebted Kindness drop into a god roll, but when paired with Loose Change, this weapon reaches a whole different level. Jolt counts as an elemental debuff, and since players will be applying it to every enemy they hit with Voltshot, Loose Change will be giving Indebted Kindness massively improved Reload Speed, Aim Assist, and movement speed while aiming almost all the time.

Voltshot is an on-kill perk like Kill Clip. After defeating a target with a Voltshot weapon, the next shot will apply Jolt to targets. Meanwhile, Loose Change grants all the stats mentioned above to the weapon after players defeat enemies affected by elemental debuffs.

Compass Rose

  • Corkscrew Rifling + Light Mag + Snapshot Sights + Slideshot + Handling Masterwork

The Compass Rose is one of the best shotguns in Destiny 2 thanks to its high base Range and Aim Assist stats. It's normally bogged down by its below-average Handling, but with the perks listed above, it should become a non-issue. The Snapshot + Slideshot combo in particular will make this weapon an absolute menace in PvP.

Snapshot Sights greatly improves the ADS speed of weapons, and while aiming down sights doesn't tighten pellet spread by much, it can still help Shotguns feel more consistent, especially when paired with Slideshot and its Range boost.

Hothead (Adept)

  • Hard Launch + Impact Casing + Tracking Module + Clown Cartridge + Reload Masterwork

The Hothead is popular for its high DPS potential, and while this roll won't result in big damage numbers, players can expect it to be very easy to use, especially against bosses that refuse to stand still. Tracking Module is an amazing perk for Rocket Launchers, and while Clown Cartridge won't boost damage numbers, it'll greatly improve DPS by letting players fire more rockets before reloading.

The sugar on top of this god roll is that it's an Adept Hothead, which means players can stick an Adept Reload mod here to crank the weapon's DPS up even further. Make sure to bring some Reserve mods to get more ammo.

VS Chill Inhibitor

The VS Chill Inhibitor is one of the new weapons from Destiny 2's Vesper's Host dungeon, and it's also one of the best guns to farm for there. This is because of the Envious Arsenal and Bait and Switch perk combo both trigger when players hit enemies using their other weapons, turning this Heavy Grenade Launcher into an absolute beast when it comes to dealing sustained damage.

Envious Arsenal completely refills the weapon's magazine, while Bait and Switch increases the gun's damage. Unload an entire Chill Inhibitor mag onto an enemy before tagging them with other weapons. Swap back to it, and it'll be freshly loaded with a damage buff to boot. Repeat the process untill all ammo is spent, or the target is defeated.

item.title: Monopoly GO Partner Event Schedule (November 2024)
item.description:
Monopoly GO constantly introduces new events to keep players engaged and entertained. These events are categorized into tournaments, solo events, and special limited-time events, like Partner Events. Partner Events are fun collaborative events, where you can team up with your Monopoly GO friends to build attractions together.

These events add a sort of co-op element to Monopoly GO and reward you with tons of sticker packs, dice, cash, new tokens, and occasionally a Wild Sticker. If you're wondering when the next Partner Event will take place, this guide is here to help.

Updated by Usama Ali on November 6, 2024 : Monopoly GOs Partner Events are the perfect way to team up with friends and win big prizes. These events occur monthly, bringing fresh themes and exciting challenges each time. By working together and building the required landmarks on your board, you and your partners can win lots of rewards, including a Wild Sticker, a new Token, and free dice rolls. While official details are still under wraps, this guide has been updated with a tentative date for the next exciting Partner Event in Monopoly GO.

When Is The Next Partner Event in Monopoly GO?

Partner Events usually last for four to five days . During these events, you and your friends team up to build four unique attractions on your board. To complete these attractions, you'll need to collect special event tokens and contribute equally to the building process.

Monopoly GOs Partner Events follow a consistent monthly pattern, which makes it easy to predict when the next exciting event will begin. The most recent Partner Event, a spooky Halloween-themed adventure, took place in late October, exactly a month after the previous one.

Considering the events past schedule, the tentative dates for the next Partner Event in Monopoly GO are November 15, 2024, to November 25, 2024. While the exact details will be finalized upon launch, players can expect to win up to 5,000 dice rolls, a Wild Sticker, and a brand-new board token.

Scopely has not yet announced an official release date for the next Partner Event in Monopoly GO and this tentative date is just based on past event patterns.

The table below gives a quick overview of all the Monopoly GO Partner Events that have occurred so far.

Event Name

Start Date

End Date

Scary Cake Partners

October 22, 2024

October 27, 2024

Desert Bloom Partners

September 19, 2024

September 24, 2024

Rocket Partners

August 15, 2024

August 20, 2024

Ice Cream Partners

July 10, 2024

July 15, 2024

Aqua Partners

June 22, 2024

June 27, 2024

Robo Partners

May 16, 2024

May 21, 2024

Parade Partners

April 26, 2024

May 01, 2024

Fountain Partners

April 06, 2024

April 11, 2024

Hot Rod Partners

March 08, 2024

March 13, 2024

Valentines Partners

February 09, 2024

February 14, 2024

Gardening Partners

January 08, 2024

January 13, 2024

Gift Partners

December 15, 2023

December 20, 2023

Can You Change Your Partner In Monopoly GOs Partner Event?

Unfortunately, once you've partnered with another player in a Partner Event, you cannot change your partner for the duration of that event . Since the partnership is permanent for the entire event, its important to choose your partner wisely. You can consider inviting your real-life friends to Monopoly GO and partnering with them in the next Partner Event.

Its worth noting that, to join Partner events in Monopoly Go , players will have to reach Board 5 , which can be achieved in a few hours.

item.title: AFK Journey Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All AFK Journey Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for AFK Journey

In this article, you will learn about all the codes for a cool adventure RPG game called AFK Journey . With the help of them, you can get plenty of diamonds and gold, which you can spend on any of your needs. No one knows when these codes will expire, so hurry and redeem all of them while you still have the chance.

Updated November 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Below we have added one new code that offers 500 diamonds. We also checked the rest of the codes, and if you haven't redeemed them yet, you're lucky because you have the opportunity to get a lot of freebies.

All AFK Journey Codes

Working AFK Journey Codes

  • oN2yO0lJ6e - Redeem this code to get 500 diamonds. (NEW)
  • AFKJ1.2.2UPDATE - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • CCPROGRAM - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • JOURNEYWITHTASI - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • YCVVXJDA7G - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJGIFT - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJ10 - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • GIFT4YOUAFKJ - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJWINDAH - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • MAGICAFKJOURNEY - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJGIFT2024 - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJomedetou - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJCREATOR - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJCOMMUNITY - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • PLAYAFKJOURNEY - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJRPG888 - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJPC - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJ8888 - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJ9999 - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • AFKJOSHIKATSU - Redeem this code to get diamonds and gold.
  • PLUTOMALLEXTRA5% - Redeem this code to get 100 diamonds and 20000 gold.

Expired Codes

  • MARKIJOURNEY
  • AFKJN2024
  • hwidnabwbd
  • LILITH11AFKJ
  • AFKJLILYPICHU
  • AFKJRUBBERROSS
  • AFKJLUDWIG
  • AFKJNEWSEASON
  • AFKJVOLKIN
  • AFKJBARRY
  • AFKJMTASHED
  • AFKJZEEEBO
  • AFKJCREATIONFEST
  • AFKJUPDATE
  • AFKJCCPROGRAM
  • AFKJAPRIL20
  • AFKJourneyAlpharad
  • AFKJourneyPRESTON
  • AFKJourneyHI
  • AFKJourneySpecialEDD
  • AFKJourneyRUG
  • AFKJourneyPG0
  • AFKJourneyLGIO
  • AFKJourneyJianhao
  • afkjourneyjoshdub
  • AFKJourneyVIVA
  • AFKJourneyTGT
  • AFKJourneyVG
  • AFKJourneyNOGLA
  • AFKJourneyCMK
  • AFKJourneyCarbot
  • AFKJourneyMSA
  • AFKJourneyDE
  • AFKJourneySqueezie
  • AFKJourney88
  • AFKJourneyZanny
  • AFKJourneyTT
  • AFKJourneyCreator
  • AFKJourneyZekiaPax
  • AFKJourneyDishPax
  • AFKJourneyLilyPax
  • AFKJourneyArt
  • AFKJourneyPAX
  • WELCOME
  • LAUNCH
  • BETATESTING

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, getting some free gold and diamonds is always a plus. You can spend it on upgrading your characters, unlocking new ones, or buying the necessary items and equipment to be more effective in battle. Luckily, the developers are generous and often add new AFK Journey codes so you can use them and progress more quickly.

How to Redeem Codes for AFK Journey

Fortunately, redeeming AFK Journey codes is not difficult, and compared to most other games of this genre, you can do it directly in the game, rather than in a browser. Before you can redeem the codes, you will need to complete the tutorial, which will take a total of 510 minutes, depending on whether you skip dialogue. After clearing the tutorial, you'll be free to follow these detailed instructions on how to redeem the codes in AFK Journey :

  • After launching the game, pay attention to the lower-right corner. There will be a button with three lines on the icon and you should click on it.
  • Once you do this, you will be taken to a new menu with many options and buttons.
  • In the lower-right corner of this menu, you will notice a button with a gear icon. Click on it to open the settings menu.
  • Once you open the settings menu, you will notice many different options and several tabs that you can switch between in the top section of the menu. Among these tabs, interact with the last one that says Other.
  • Once you open this tab, you will again see plenty of buttons that are divided into three sections.
  • In the second section, called Others, there will be a Promo Code button. It is the last one in the first row and you have to click on it.
  • After doing this, you will open the redemption menu, where there will be an input field and two buttons, one with a cross and the other with a check mark. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above active codes into the input field.
  • Once you've done that, click on the green checkmark button to submit your reward request.
  • If you did everything correctly, you will see a notification on the screen listing the rewards you have received.

Be sure to redeem all the codes as soon as possible, as they may expire, and you will miss out on the rewards forever.
